speaker: Donald Trump
transcription: She just died? Wow. I didn’t know that. You’re telling me now for the first time. She led an amazing life. What else can you say? She was an amazing woman. Whether you agreed or not, she was an amazing woman who led an amazing life. I’m actually saddened to hear that. I am sadden to hear that. Thank you very much.
headlin: Donald Trump Learns About Ruth Bader Ginsburg’s Death, His Reaction Transcript
